newsitem.title: PERU: Peru central bank offers 70 mln soles 28-day CDs.
newsitem.headline: Peru central bank offers 70 mln soles 28-day CDs.

text.p: The Central Reserve Bank of Peru said Thursday it would accept bids for 28-day Certificates of Deposit (CDs) worth 70.0 million soles until 1430 local time/1430 EST BCQZ.
All the certificates have a January 10 starting date.
The average effective annual interest rate for the certificates, which will be announced after the auction, is used as an informal indicator for interest rates in the Peruvian financial system.
